attributes.title: oh no ✨🦋🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support this cheeto president but unfortunately when i let my dog use my phone she logged on the app. all i heard was her screaming and barking for help. i look at my phone and see it was his n00d 😳. she told me “why is it so tiny?” ever since then she’s been traumatized and every time we eat cheetos she laughs and says “this cheeto is bigger.” i told her to never settle for an orange. she has learned from her mistakes and we will grow from this. ✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨✨

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and there were so many glitches.🧚‍♂️ I don’t know how someone could run such a terrible app and still have confidence in themselves.🦋 This app should be taken down immediately.👄

attributes.title: Never again ✨🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: Terrible app. Takes to much storage and data up. So many nonfictions and unnecessary alerts. When I went on twitter I saw the orange 🍊 mans cheeto 🍤🤢🤮. I am very worried something will be leaked on this app. I am scared for humanity, people fear him so should you.

attributes.title: no 💖
attributes.review: it a no for me ❤️. this app has no flavor and is very unoriginal and boring 😹. instead of it being red, white and blue, it could have more flavor changing it to black and yellow 😹😺😯✨🧚🏼‍♀️. this cheeto puff has all this money and created this😠😯✨. but i fw you for trying ❤️ SIKKEEEE anyways chile the manny will not be televised 😽💖🙈.

attributes.title: Ruined my life
attributes.review: It asked for my birthday, zodiac, natal chart, phone number, address, MySpace, social security number the last time you messed with a Ouija board and advocates the use of the witchcraft! Probably won’t even work while Jupiter is in retrograde!

attributes.title: Terrible overall experience
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it kept glitching and showing me a picture of a Cheeto and not even the flaming hot kind. Then it asked me to vote for the unseasoned Cheeto. Hence, the 1 out of 5 stars. It’s disgusting that they’re taking advantage of me like that 😡

attributes.title: disappointing
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be able to further my support on our lovely sex trafficking, racist, rapist and all in all murderer president and I ended up blasting myself to the moon now I’m out here fighting Vector for WiFi. Absolutely disgusting never again.

attributes.title: Anyone but trump 2020
attributes.review: I don’t even understand how he got elected in the first place he put us 1.3 trillion dollars into debt, has traces for involvement in sex trafficking, has over 11 sexual assault charges and no action taken. This man has enormous stupidity and doesn’t deserve the title president.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Donald trump is my hero 😭😭😭 but sadly the app made my phone grow legs and run into the toilet where my parakeet pooped on it. Then, when my parakeet saw the phone, something in her clicked and she started screaming “trump is trash” over and over again. Don’t get this app

attributes.title: horrifying
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to support the wonderful president i have and when i did my phone started acting up and glitching badly that it even shocked me!!! i thought nothing of it until i heard a loud scream outside and saw that my cat got ran over! apparently the person who ran him over wasnt happy with the fact my cat was white and said “black lives matter” i regret downloading this app for many reasons but mostly for the homicide of my cat.
